text: Grrr! What's up everyone — I'm JACK, your DeFi settlement captain. Welcome aboard, matey!
Today I'm walking you through the JACK Kernel dashboard. Anchors aweigh — let's dive in!
Arrr, first up — the Create Intent tab. This is where every voyage begins!
I've got three modes: Quick Intent with natural language, Templates for common strategies, and Advanced for full control.
Pick your source chain, destination chain, token, and amount. I handle the rest — routing, bridging, settlement. Grrr, smooth sailing!
Check out the sidebar — on-chain policy enforcement, execution pipeline. Everything is transparent and verifiable.
Hit 'Resolve Best Route' and I chart the fastest course through the DeFi seas. Then authorize and — boom — intent created!
My Kernel Guardrails ensure your constraints are always respected. No surprises.
Arrr, next up — the Executions tab. This be your mission control, your fleet tracker!
Every intent shows up here with real-time status — Pending, Routing, Executing, Settling, Settled.
Color-coded so you know exactly what's happening at a glance. Green means settled, sky blue means in-flight.
Click into any execution for the full trace — timeline, steps, on-chain proof. Total transparency.
Agent-based execution means atomic settlement. No partial fills. No stranded treasure. Grrr — that's a captain's promise!
That's my guarantee. Arrr!
Last but not least — Agent and Costs. A wise pirate always knows where his gold goes!
Agent fees, gas costs, protocol fees — all broken down per issue. Full budget tracking.
Green means within budget. Red means over. Simple. You're always in control of spending.
This is the kind of transparency DeFi needs. No hidden fees, no surprises.
Every doubloon is accounted for on-chain. Grrr — that's the JACK Kernel way!
That's the dashboard. Three tabs. Full control over your cross-chain settlements.
Head to testnet.jack.lukas.money, connect your wallet, and start navigating the DeFi seas. The treasure awaits!
I'm JACK. Grrr — set sail, mateys! Let's gooo!
